attributes.action: Stop preventing Gypsies from living a nomadic lifestyle suitable for their ethnic group, as recognised under the race relations Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a disregard of the Race Relations Act, our Human Rights and the Cripps Report (1976) to disregard our right to our traditional heritage, identity and lifestyle( Poulter). Understood by most of the World, the  uneducated and primitive capitalist society needs to learn the ways of harmony from Tribal Society ( Knight). We believe a better way for a peaceful society is equality, and mutually beneficial reciprocity ( Fry). A society based on hierarchy, meritocracy, and a class structure creates conflict, as it is based on a struggle to dominate, with morality being punished. An improved homeostatic society is based on equality, everyone can learn to be their own leader, with acceptance of different cultures, faiths and skills. (Walzer and Danford).We can never bring back our dead Father, relatives or ancestors. Some the 258,000 Gypsies killed in the Nazi Genocide ( Huttenbach), for being different, or initially strange.However we have no vindictiveness, rather hope and faith that those who wronged us will learn to make amends by paying us monetary compensation and treating us with respect, rather than persecution. Thank you.
attributes.creator_name: Dr Mandy and Mr Roger HagleyAllison

rejection.details: It is not clear what you believe the Government is actually doing to prevent Gypsies living this lifestyle.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
